objective.summary: I am an Electrical Engineering Graduate registered with the Engineering Council of South Africa (ECSA) as a Candidate Engineering Technologist and a Teacher of English as a Foreign Language. With a foundation in creative thinking, critical problem-solving, and effective communication, I am seeking opportunities to gain practical experience in my career field.

experience.description:
Engaging in hands-on learning experiences focused on Agile Rapid Skills Acquisition, Engineering Business Systems for 4IR, Technologies Bootcamps, and Full Stack Web Development.
Actively participating in workshops, projects, and practical exercises to enhance skills and understanding of modern digital technologies.
Collaborating with mentors and industry professionals to gain insights and practical knowledge relevant to the field of technology and engineering.

education.course: Bachelor of Engineering Technology in Electrical Engineering

achievementsawards.a: Candidate Engineering Technologist with Engineering Council South Africa (ECSA)
achievementsawards.c: Mentor of the Year (Akanani Mens Residence)

references.name: Mr. Andy Balaram, Community Engagement Specialist: University of Johannesburg
Mr. MJ Mvelase, Lecturer: University of Johannesburg
Mr. Mekoa, Educator: Ipokelleng Secondary School
